desc:
The giant bombardier beetle is among the most surprising creatures lurking on the forest floor. A placid herbivore content to go about its business, the beetle has a powerful defense mechanism in the form of a boiling liquid it can spray to scald would-be predators as it makes its escape.  
_Many types of beetles inhabit the world, and, depending on the location and culture, they are used as food, companions, or beasts of burden by its people._  
_**Forest Beetles.**_ Open Game License
name: Giant Bombardier Beetle

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spray
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) fire damage.
